name: Cavern Scurge
description:
Move with ASDW.

Attack with J.

up attack W+J.

Jump with K.

Whip HOOKS to swing, then jump to start swinging and stop swinging.

whip Switches and walk away to open trap doors.

be careful.

kill bad guys.

Sadly I didn't get to use most of sunday, so I didn't implement a boss, just increasing points... but it is still a neat game.
